title: Smart Data Models - RaiseLowerCommand
description: Adapted from CIM data models. An analog control that increase or decrease a set point value with pulses.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be RaiseLowerCommand

ValueAliasSet.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The ValueAliasSet used for translation of a Control value to a name. Default: None
